did.unittitle: AFL-CIO Speech "Union Busters: A New Growth Industry" Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: Audio recording of an AFL-CIO Labor News conference held on July 17, 1979.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: AFL-CIO Speech "Union Busters: A New Growth Industry" Audio-Visual Materials #5624 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5625 AV: Ralph Helsin Speech "Technology and the Unions" Audio-Visual Materials 5626 AV: Walter Reuther Speech "Concentration of Private Power" Audio-Visual Materials 5627 AV: UAW Representations Speech "Labor Looks at Itself" Audio-Visual Materials 5628 AV: Paul P. Harbrecht, SJ. Speech "Sources of Labor Power" Audio-Visual Materials

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Alan Kistler, Director of the AFL-CIO, Dept. of Organization and Field Services, Philip Shabecoff of N.Y. Times, Drew Von Bergen of UPI ; Moderator: Charlie Hughes -- Tuesday, July 17, 1979 -- 9:05 p.m. (EDT)
